service.title: Terms of Service
service.description: Terms and conditions for using the food delivery app
service.content:
TERMS OF SERVICE

1. INTRODUCTION
Welcome to our food delivery app. By using the service, you agree to comply with the following terms.

2. SERVICES
- Online food ordering from partner restaurants
- Home delivery within service areas
- Secure payment through multiple methods

3. USER RESPONSIBILITIES
- Provide accurate information
- Pay on time
- Comply with delivery regulations

4. ORDER CANCELLATION POLICY
- Free cancellation within the first 5 minutes
- Cancellation fee applies after this time

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: How we collect, use and protect your information
privacy.content:
PRIVACY POLICY

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT
We collect:
- Personal information: name, phone number, address
- Payment information (encrypted)
- Order history and preferences

2. HOW WE USE INFORMATION
- Process orders and delivery
- Improve service quality
- Send important notifications

3. INFORMATION PROTECTION
- SSL 256-bit data encryption
- No sharing information with third parties
- Compliance with personal data protection laws

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.description: Regulations on payment, refunds and transaction security
payment.content:
PAYMENT TERMS

1. PAYMENT METHODS
- Cash on Delivery (COD)
- Digital wallets: MoMo, ZaloPay, ViettelPay
- Bank cards and QR Code

2. REFUND POLICY
- 100% refund if order is cancelled due to our fault
- Refund within 3-5 business days
- No refunds for successfully delivered orders

3. PAYMENT SECURITY
- Payment information is encrypted
- No card information stored on system
- PCI DSS standard compliance
